description: This file defines the HdcpProfile class which implements a plugin for a JSONRPC server managing HDCP (High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection) status and HDMI events. The class inherits from PluginHost::IPlugin and PluginHost::JSONRPC and includes method declarations for initializing, handling events, and exposing plugin functions.

classes.name: HdcpProfile
classes.description: A class that implements a plugin for managing HDCP profiles and HDMI events within the WPEFramework, offering JSONRPC methods and event handling capabilities.

methods.name: getHDCPStatusWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper method to retrieve the current HDCP status, interacting with JSON objects.

methods.name: getSettopHDCPSupportWrapper
methods.description: Wrapper method to determine if the set-top supports HDCP.

methods.name: getHDCPStatus
methods.description: Retrieves the current HDCP status as a JsonObject.

methods.name: onHdmiOutputHotPlug
methods.description: Event handler for HDMI hotplug events.

methods.name: onHdmiOutputHDCPStatusEvent
methods.description: Event handler for HDMI HDCP status change events.

methods.name: logHdcpStatus
methods.description: Logs the HDCP status change or event.

methods.name: dsHdmiEventHandler
methods.description: Static event handler for HDMI-related IARM events.

ctags.name: HdcpProfile
ctags.pattern: /^        class HdcpProfile : public PluginHost::IPlugin, public PluginHost::JSONRPC {$/

ctags.name: Information
ctags.pattern: /^            virtual string Information() const override { return {}; }$/
